channel.title: winter on Life At The Circus
channel.description: Recent content in winter on Life At The Circus

item.title: A Beautiful Surprise
item.description: I recall seeing something on Facebook before I went to bed about possible flash freezing or snow. But, I didn’t give it much thought. When I woke up I peeked behind the curtain to see if anything came of it and I gasped. It was that big white puffy snow that sticks to the branches of trees. My most favorite kind of snowfall. And I laid in bed and watched it fall snuggling with my hubby and kids.

item.title: The Circus Take the Ice
item.description: I wasn’t aiming for some idealist, Kodak winter moment. Just an evening of winter fun with the kids. With the baby dropped off at my in laws, Scott and I set out for an evening on the ice with the big 3. Scott had his reservations and voiced them a few times. But, I was confident we’d be fine. Once we were all laced up and approaching the rink, my confidence began to waver.
